Class SubscriptionManagementControls

java.lang.Object
com.Software.FitnessSystem.AdminControllers.SubscriptionManagementControls
public class SubscriptionManagementControls extends Object
Provides controls for managing subscription plans and user subscriptions. Includes functionality for adding, editing, deleting, and viewing subscription plans, as well as updating user subscription details.
Author:
Muath Hassoun

  • Constructor Details

    • SubscriptionManagementControls

      public SubscriptionManagementControls()

  • Method Details

    • dealWithSubscriptionPlan

      public static boolean dealWithSubscriptionPlan()
      Displays the main menu for managing subscription plans and handles user interaction. Users can add, edit, delete, or exit the subscription plan management menu.
      Returns:
      true if an operation was completed successfully, or the user chooses to go back; false otherwise.

    • printSubscriptionPlan

      public static boolean printSubscriptionPlan()
      Prints the details of all subscription plans currently available.
      Returns:
      true if subscription plans are printed successfully; false if no plans exist.

    • returnIsPrinted

      public static boolean returnIsPrinted()
      Returns the current status of the `isPrinted` flag, indicating whether subscription plans were printed.
      Returns:
      true if plans have been printed; false otherwise.

    • dealWithUsersSubscriptionPlan

      public static void dealWithUsersSubscriptionPlan()
      Deals with a user's subscription plan by performing various operations such as updating, renewing, or applying free trials to the subscription plan. This method interacts with the user to determine the desired action and executes accordingly.

    • updateUserSubscriptionPlan

      public static <T extends User> boolean updateUserSubscriptionPlan(SubscriptionPlan subscriptionPlan, T user, String newPlanType, boolean justRenew, boolean renewAndReverseSubscription)
      Updates the subscription plan of a user.
      Type Parameters:
      T - A type parameter extending User.
      Parameters:
      subscriptionPlan - The SubscriptionPlan object associated with the user.
      user - The user whose subscription plan is being updated.
      newPlanType - The new subscription plan type.
      justRenew - Flag indicating if the plan is only being renewed.
      renewAndReverseSubscription - Flag indicating if the plan type should be reversed and renewed.
      Returns:
      True if the subscription plan is updated successfully; false otherwise.

    • giveTheUserNewSubscriptionOpportunity

      public static <T extends User> void giveTheUserNewSubscriptionOpportunity(SubscriptionPlan subscriptionPlan, T user)
      Provides the user with a free subscription trial based on the subscription plan.
      Type Parameters:
      T - A type parameter extending User.
      Parameters:
      subscriptionPlan - The SubscriptionPlan object associated with the user.
      user - The user receiving the free trial.
